name: SAME DAY
description:
This is a game where you work in a factory.

You have to live the same day by repeating the same labor every day.

The game is a way to score points by clicking when the face of a doll passing on the rail becomes in a circle position.

I tried to capture the reality of living the same day as the busy society and work of the modern era.

I hope you enjoy the game which is not enough but hard-working.
